footer.text: ❗ If you are still unable to link, contact a staff member. ❗

fields.name: :link: Linking your Spigot account.
fields.value:
`1.` - Under your [contact details](https://www.spigotmc.org/account/contact-details) on Spigot set your Discord to your full Discord name, ie `md_5#0001`

`2.` - Be sure to check your privacy settings and allow people to see your contact details or else we won't see it.

`3.` - Type /spigot <spigot id>

fields.name: :question: Unable to link your account?
fields.value:
Here's some troubleshooting steps to check:

•Come back later! Your info was probably cached without the id. 

• Check your spigot privacy settings so non-members can see your contact details.

• Check your discord is spelt correctly and contains your discriminator ie. `#0001`

• Your ID # is found after your username in the url of your [profile page](https://i.imgur.com/iz1MdTJ.png). :arrow_down:
